question: Which sportsperson has clinched women's trap gold at the 62nd National Shotgun championship 2018?
explanation: Varsha Varman from Madhya Pradesh has won the women\'s trap gold at the 62nd National Shotgun championship 2018 in Jaipur, Rajasthan. She shot 38 in the final to get the better of Junior World Cup finalist Soumya Gupta of Delhi, who ended with 37 hits for the silver medal. Defending champion Shagun Chowdhary of ONGC won bronze with a final round effort of 30.  Earlier, Varman  won the bronze at the 2014 Incheon Asian Games in the women\'s double trap team event, along with Shagun Chowdhary and Shreyasi Singh.
